mapper.insert: insert into hzs_sys_config (hssc_id, hssc_name, hssc_flag, hssc_value, hssc_type, hssc_refer_value, hssc_group, sort_num) values (#{hsscId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hsscName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hsscFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hsscValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hsscType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hsscReferValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hsscGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortNum,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update hzs_sys_config set hssc_name = #{hsscName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hssc_flag = #{hsscFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hssc_value = #{hsscValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hssc_type = #{hsscType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hssc_refer_value = #{hsscReferValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hssc_group = #{hsscGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort_num = #{sortNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} where hssc_id = #{hsscId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select hssc_id, hssc_name, hssc_flag, hssc_value, hssc_type, hssc_refer_value, hssc_group, sort_num from hzs_sys_config where hssc_id = #{hsscId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select hssc_id, hssc_name, hssc_flag, hssc_value, hssc_type, hssc_refer_value, hssc_group, sort_num from hzs_sys_config where hssc_flag = #{flagName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
